

State the hypothesis


```{r}

alpha <- 0.10
Zcritical <- round(qnorm(1 - alpha), 2)
Zcritical

np1 <- 35
p1 <- round(17 / 35, 2)
p1

np2 <- 40
p2 <- round(16 / 40, 2)
p2


p_addict <- round((17 + 16) / (35 + 40), 2)
p_addict

q_addict <- 1 - p_addict
q_addict


zTest <- round((p1 - p2 - 0) / sqrt((p_addict * q_addict) * ((1 / np1) + (1 / np2))), 2)
zTest
```
